entry.title: Masinagudi
entry.summary:
Masinagudi

One of the best weekend getaways near bangalore, especially in monsoon season.Its surrounded with lush greenery and beautiful mountain view. We had stayed in a wonderful home stay called Bamboo Banks guest house. Its set in a 42 acre farm with just around 4 cottages, each wonderful in its own way. Horse riding, a dip in the pool and a short walk through the farm would take up your entire day. Do stay there, if you are in masinagudi.
